pages.text: $(li)Dolphins are neutral creatures that can be found over the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/ocean)Oceans$(/l).$(br)$(li)If you are near of one of them, it will give you a $(l)Speed Boost$() effect making you swim faster.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/raw_cod)Raw Cods$(/l) on death.
